role.descr: entity abolished // normal transcription, normal splicing //

example.text: A G-to-A transition at the first nucleotide of intron 2 of patient 1 abolished normal splicing.
example.arg: a G-to-A transition at the first nucleotide of intron 2

example.text: Alp activity was abolished by Insertions which interrupt this open reading frame.
Formation of liver metastases in mice was abolished by linomide and antibody-targeted superantigen therapy.
example.arg: formation of liver metastases in mice

example.text: Groucho binding is abolished by mutating a conserved phenylalanine of the eh1/GEH sequence to glutamic acid (Jimnez et al., 1999).
example.arg: mutating a conserved phenylalanine of the eh1/GEH sequence to glutamic acid

example.text: HA and curli production by strain chi7122 are abolished by disruption of rpoS, mlrA or csgA, and the curli subunit gene.
example.arg: disruption of rpoS, mlrA or csgA, and the curli subunit gene
HA and curli production by strain chi7122

example.text: However, this complete removal of FabD from the crude FAS will not abolish its BCFA biosynthesis, but only reduced the level to 50-60% of the control level for acyl-CoA primer and to 80% for alpha-keto-beta-methylvalerate primer.
example.arg: this complete removal of FabD from the crude FAS

example.text: Linomide and antibody-targeted superantigen therapy abolished formation of liver metastases in mice.
example.arg: formation of liver metastases in mice

example.text: Linomide and antibody-targeted superantigen therapy will abolish formation of liver metastases in mice.
example.arg: formation of liver metastases in mice

example.text: Mutating a conserved phenylalanine of the eh1/GEH sequence to glutamic acid abolishes groucho binding (Jimnez et al., 1999).
example.arg: mutating a conserved phenylalanine of the eh1/GEH sequence to glutamic acid

example.text: Mutations in the fhlA gene also abolish production of the hydrogenase activity associated with formate hydrogenlyase activity.
Normal splicing is abolished by a G-to-A transition at the first nucleotide of intron 2 of patient 1.
example.arg: a G-to-A transition at the first nucleotide of intron 2

example.text: The production of the hydrogenase activity associated with formate hydrogenlyase activity can be abolished by mutations in the fhlA gene.
Groucho binding was, however, abolished by mutating a conserved phenylalanine of the eh1/GEH sequence to glutamic acid (Jimnez et al., 1999).
example.arg: mutating a conserved phenylalanine of the eh1/GEH sequence to glutamic acid

example.text: Linomide and antibody-targeted superantigen therapy abolishes formation of liver metastases in mice.
example.arg: formation of liver metastases in mice

example.text: Alp activity were abolished by Insertions.

Furthermore, HA and curli production by strain chi7122 in stationary-phase cells is completely abolished by disruption of rpoS, mlrA or csgA, the curli subunit gene, suggesting that YhiE plays a critical role in stationary-phase acid resistance.

example.text: Furthermore, Insertions will completely abolish Alp activity in stationary-phase cells, suggesting that YhiE plays a critical role in stationary-phase acid resistance.
